goal.roles_and_responsibilities:
Build outstanding domain-focused data solutions with internal teams, business analysts, and stakeholders.
Apply AI/ML practices and standards to develop robust and maintainable solutions.
Motivated by a fast-paced, service-oriented environment and interacting directly with clients on new features for future product releases
A natural problem-solver and intellectually curious across a breadth of industries and topics
Acquainted in different aspects of Data Management like Data Strategy, Architecture, Governance, Data Quality, Integrity & Data Integration, and Model Deployment.
Study and transform data science prototypes.
Extremely well-versed in designing/developing models and monitoring.
